original_solution_mapping.L1: Since Will was 4 years old 3 years ago, then he is 4+3 = <<4+3=7>>7 years old now
original_solution_mapping.L2: Dina is twice as old as he is so she is 2*7 = <<2*7=14>>14 years old now
original_solution_mapping.L3: In 5 years, Will will be 7+5 = <<7+5=12>>12 years old
original_solution_mapping.L4: In 5 years, Diane will be 14+5 = 19 years old
original_solution_mapping.L5: The sum of their ages at that time will be 12+19 = <<12+19=31>>31 years

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3403.
    Returns: the sum of their ages in 5 years.
    """
    # L1
    will_age_past = 4 # 4 years old 3 years ago
    years_ago = 3 # 3 years ago
    will_age_now = will_age_past + years_ago

    # L2
    diane_age_multiplier = 2 # twice as old
    diane_age_now = diane_age_multiplier * will_age_now

    # L3
    years_future = 5 # in 5 years
    will_age_future = will_age_now + years_future

    # L4
    diane_age_future = diane_age_now + years_future

    # L5
    sum_ages_future = will_age_future + diane_age_future

    # FA
    answer = sum_ages_future
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Since Will was {will_age_past} years old {years_ago} years ago, then he is {will_age_past}+{years_ago} = <<{will_age_past}+{years_ago}={will_age_now}>>{will_age_now} years old now
Dina is twice as old as he is so she is {diane_age_multiplier}*{will_age_now} = <<{diane_age_multiplier}*{will_age_now}={diane_age_now}>>{diane_age_now} years old now
In {years_future} years, Will will be {will_age_now}+{years_future} = <<{will_age_now}+{years_future}={will_age_future}>>{will_age_future} years old
In {years_future} years, Diane will be {diane_age_now}+{years_future} = {diane_age_future} years old
The sum of their ages at that time will be {will_age_future}+{diane_age_future} = <<{will_age_future}+{diane_age_future}={sum_ages_future}>>{sum_ages_future} years
